headline: Katie Holmes Custody Settlement: 10 Celeb Custody Battles That Lasted Longer
short descr: Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes have reached a divorce settlement, including a custody arrangement for their 6-year-old daughter
image_caption(s): QUESTION: Which celebrity's custody battle landed back in court after she claimed that her ex sent her bullying emails?
article: Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes have reached a divorce settlement, including a custody arrangement for their 6-year-old daughter Suri, TMZ reported Monday. Though no details of the agreement were made public, sources close to the former couple told People that Suri will likely live with Holmes, 33, in New York, while Cruise, 50, will be given generous visitation rights.Holmes filed for divorce in late June and requested sole legal and primary residential custody of Suri. Holmes' decision to end the five-year marriage reportedly blindsided Cruise. In quickly settling out of court, the former couple sidestepped the messy custody dispute some had predicted for them -- but other Hollywood couples haven't been so lucky. Click through the slideshow below to test your knowledge of 10 of the most notorious celebrity custody battles.
